title: Top hotels to stay happily in Accra
text:
Travel Articles | July 17, 2015 
Accra is capital of Ghana the much visited city of ghana so here's the list of some best accomodations to stay in while you're in ghana. 
No doubt Accra is having much allure for visitors and all important African destinations for visiting point of view. This gorgeously located city is capital of Glamorous country Ghana and also famous for its lively and lovely people and attraction as well. This economically sound region is a Mecca of nightclubs, hotels and restaurants and here I am going to mention some best start rated hotels for you. 
African Regent Hotel 
This superlative hotel is located in Accra, Ghana and also has much to offer its all important customers. Here you can have luxury of air conditioned room with flat screen TVs, outdoor pool, room service, meeting and banqueting facilities, 24 hour reception and free Wi-Fi access. This hotel is also at its best for serving regional and international cuisines at its well appointed restaurant. You can also enjoy various special massages and body treatments facilities in its super spa and also take leisure of airport shuttle service as well 
Midindi Hotel 
This stunning hotel is located in the center of Accra, Ghana and also featured with outdoor swimming pool, two restaurants with a bar, modern air conditioned rooms, a terrace, gym, conference and business center and many other amenities. This luxurious hotel is prime location for those who visit Labadi beach as its 10 minutes drive away from the beach. 
Golden Tulip Accra 
Golden Tulip is included in the list of best hotels in Accra because of its specialties and excellent features. This hotel provides its visitors best staying experience where they can relax and live in a best environment. Prominent features of this hotel are a stunning garden, outdoor swimming pool, furnished terrace, casino, strikingly designed rooms and suites, fitness center and tennis court. Babysitting is also provided here but you have to pay some fee for enjoying that facility. Dining options are also best in its restaurant and international cuisine is cooked. 
Alisa Hotel 
Located close to an eye-catching beach, this hotel is also preferred by many tourists for their stay at Accra. All rooms in this hotel are comfortable and well-equipped with all modern facilities like air-conditioning, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and many others. A sun terrace and swimming pool of crystal-clear water is also placed in its colorful garden where visitors can enjoy swimming as well. Continental breakfast and local or international dishes are served in Alisa Hotel’s restaurant, so don’t worry about your diet when you are in this hotel. 
, souvenirs shop and a restaurant where tasty international and traditional dishes from the region and special seafood dishes are served. All rooms in this hotel are decorated exceptionally and are featured with satellite TV and private bathrooms and you can enjoy scenic views of the sea from few rooms.
